mapper.select: SELECT b.* , CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 1 THEN CONCAT(f.filename, '외 ' , COUNT(*)-1, '건') ELSE f.filename END file_name FROM board b LEFT JOIN file f ON b.bno = f.bno WHERE b.delete_yn != 1 AND b.board_type=#{boardType} GROUP BY b.bno ORDER BY b.bno DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{pageOffset}
